title: About Us
section-1-header: Fivebazar is the best place to do great deals from anywhere
section-1-text: It is the largest free online classifieds site with an advanced security system. We provide a simple solution to buy and sell everything.
reg-text: Register using your email and phone number (or do so via Facebook or Google). Make sure you enter a correct phone number, so your customers can contact you!
pix-title: Take a picture of your object
pix-text: Feel free to take lots of photos using your smartphone. Make sure they show your item in the best light.
sell-text: Choose a suitable category, upload your photos and write a clear title and full description of your item. Enter a fair price, select attributes and submit your ad for review!
msg-title: Reply to messages and calls from our interested users!
msg-text: Hopefully your ad will be on FiveBazar within a couple of minutes after submitting to moderation. We will notify you when your ad is posted. Check your posts and get ready to earn!
browse-title: Browse or search our listing catalog.
browse-text: Find what you need using the search panel and filters. We have over a million ads, choose exactly what you are looking for.
contact-text: Use the chat interface or call them by phone. Discuss all the details, negotiate the price.
collect-title: Collect your item or order a delivery.
collect-text: We check our sellers carefully, but it's always best to double-check, right? Meet a seller in a public place and make sure you only pay after you pick up your item.
feedback-title: Leave your feedback on the seller.
feedback-text: Feel free to provide a review of your purchase. Your feedback will be posted online on the seller's page and will be very useful for other buyers. Let's build a safe and professional community together!
gen-text: We take the safety of our users very seriously and can solve any problem quickly. That's why we kindly ask you to leave a review after your purchase. If you have problems with a seller, you can report it to us. and the Fivebazar team will review the seller as soon as possible.
personal-text-2: Try to meet in a public and safe place
personal-text-3: Check the item BEFORE you buy it
personal-text-4: Pay only after collecting the item
